text: Dysgonomonas oryzarvi is a Gram-negative, short-rod-shaped, anaerobic and non- motile bacterium from the genus of Dysgonomonas. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Dysgonomonas oryzarvi at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Dysgonomonas oryzarvi
